es.jrq.pcc.core.model

Class Studio

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.jrq.pcc.core.model.Studio

  • public class Studio
extends java.lang.Object
    Bean class modeling Studio entity. It will be referenced by its id field as 'Rights Owner'.
    Author:
    JRQ
